TopicTitle: World-Firsts Record-Keeping Society only with no RV

Articles.Content:
hi,
I started a new career and I want to do "World-Firsts Record-Keeping Society" contracts only and never do RV/Transfer Kerbals contracts.
This is the list of which I've already completed:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/dyk16qgbjhyytga/AABkyencYLMyn8vFk_zxP3D-a?dl=0

But arrived at this point, so just after landed back to kerbin from minmus orbit,
the contract system want that I complete a RV in mun orbit.
No matter how many times I try to re-load the situation where I'm about to touch the kerbin surface when the new "World-Firsts" is created.
It's always the same "RV in mun orbit" instead of "Land on minmus"
I'm pretty sure I've already did another career before this one and I succeeded to reach the "eve flyby contract" without doing any RV in the kerbin system. But not this time.
Of course I met RV contracts during the career but I was able to avoid them reloading saves until I get the best paying hi-starred contracts.
I'm gonna start another career to see if I have more luck but imho the system with which the "World-Firsts Record-Keeping Society" contracts are assigned must be revised.
always imho the RV/Transfer contracts are boring and repetitive.

Edited September 29, 2020 by antipro
Just go to Minmus anyway, it'll award the funds and reputation, minus the advance payment.

8 hours ago, antipro said:

I'm gonna start another career to see if I have more luck but imho the system with which the "World-Firsts Record-Keeping Society" contracts are assigned must be revised.

 

 

I noticed in last version that this contracts changes every 5 in-game days now if you don't accept it.
